attributes.action: Keep gyms open and classed as essential during “second wave lockdown”
attributes.additional_details:
I feel gyms are essential to the overall health and wellness of a majority of people.

Great lengths have been taken to ensure guidelines have been met and hygiene and safety is paramount. 

I believe closing these establishments would have a grave impact on many peoples physical and mental health, and could have an adverse effect on immune systems
attributes.background: Keep gyms open during the second wave lockdown.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
